author: Washington Post Staff
title: Stephanie Grisham out as White House press secretary after eight months during which she held no regular press briefings
description: Grisham has worked closely with first lady Melania Trump and will now become her chief of staff and spokeswoman, the White House announced Tuesday. This is a developing story. It will be updated.
content:
Grisham was not a fixture in the inner circle of advisers to President Trump, as her predecessor Sarah Sanders had been, although White House officials have praised her loyalty.
The White House did not immediately name a successor for Grisham, who has also h… [+2898 chars]
